useCase.name: Manage User Research Participants
useCase.description: System to search, select, and manage participants for user research interviews

preconditions.precondition: User Researcher is logged in and has access to the User Research Management System

useCase.trigger: User Researcher initiates the process to search and select potential participants

mainSequence.step: User Researcher searches for potential participants based on interview topic
User Research Management System queries NSF Staff Database for staff with relevant expertise
NSF Staff Database returns list of potential NSF participants
User Research Management System presents potential participants to User Researcher
User Researcher selects NSF participants for interviews
User Research Management System sends invitation emails with interview details
NSF Persons RSVP to the invitation
User Research Management System confirms NSF participant RSVPs
